In the Matter of PIONEER BOOK PUBLISHERS, INC., Bankrupt. John NICHOLAS, Trustee, Appellant, v. PUBLISHERS COLLECTION SERVICE, INC., etc., the Miami National Bank, etc., Appellee. No. 71-1639

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Sept. 7, 1971. Rehearing Denied Oct. 1, 1971. Allen Kornblum, Miami, Fla., Stanley D. Caidin, Caidin, Rothenberg, Kogan & Kornblum, North Miami Beach, Fla., for appellant. Robert L. Floyd, L. Edward McClellan, Jr., Miami, Fla., Harrison & Kornbluh, Frates, Floyd, Pearson & Stewart, Miami, Fla., for appellees.

Before THORNBERRY, MORGAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5th Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
